--- title: "" aliases: - https://www.openscapes.org/contact/ listing: - id: recent-events-listing contents: - "events/*/index.qmd" sort: "date desc" type: grid max-items: 9 page-size: 3 categories: false sort-ui: false filter-ui: false fields: [title, image, date, categories] --- ::: column-screen ![](images/banner_imgs/text_banners/connect_with_us_banner.png)
::: white-div ::: {.medium-body-text .center-text} **This is a global movement for open, inclusive, and actionable data-driven research.**
**We're excited to connect.** :::
::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](images/minis/horst_openscapes_mountains_salmon.png){fig-align='center' fig-alt='An orange salmon with dark brown spots speckled down its back.' width=8%} ::: ::: ## JOIN THE MOVEMENT - Reuse our open lessons, slides, and more linked from our [media](media.qmd) and github: [\@openscapes](https://github.com/openscapes), [\@nasa-openscapes](https://github.com/nasa-openscapes) - Follow us on social media: [\@openscapes\@fosstodon.org](https://fosstodon.org/@openscapes) on Mastodon - Sign up for our [newsletter mailing list](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSd25jpfiAn1gYNwUPcfMVudsL625_pYbKsqxXpRazHCL6QA7g/viewform?usp=sf_link) (4x/year) - Join an upcoming [event](events.qmd), including Openscapes initiatives, community calls, and talks - Talk to your colleagues; consider [Supercharge your research](https://openscapes.github.io/supercharge-research/) or [Shifting institutional culture](https://eartharxiv.org/repository/view/5948/) for your next journal club or lab meeting ```{=html} ```
## WORK WITH US Please [email us](mailto:hello@openscapes.org) if you're interested in booking cohorts, partnering with us, sponsoring our initiatives, or sharing your wild ideas. ::: ::: ::: column-screen ::: white-div ```{=html} ```
::: ::: ::: column-screen ::: light-gray-div ::: {.blue-underline .center-text} ## **UPCOMING EVENTS** ::: Openscapes holds regular community calls, participates in conference talks, webinars, and organizes opportunities through the Champions Program and other initiatives. Browse [our events listings](events.qmd) and register to attend!
::: {#recent-events-listing} ::: ::: :::
